courses: ● Data Structures and Object Oriented Programming

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: ● Developing a feature in Angular 2 of a new credit card call center web application to be used internally by Capital One agents

● Developing a full stack web application using MongoDB, Node.js, and Angular 2 in a team of three interns. The application applies CRUD operations to roles and operations agents can have in a call center. This process originally was done through excel with the use of macros.

work.title: Computer Science Tutor
description: ● Tutored peers taking Introduction to Programming, Data Structures and Object Oriented Programming, and Introduction to Discrete Structures.

work.title: IT Electric Transmission Intern
description: ● Developed and maintained Master Cyber Asset List of approximately 500 assets in SharePoint wiki
● Created workstation layouts for various locations with Microsoft Visio
● Familiarized with the processes of the energy industry and learned terminology and software associated with the Bulk Electric System, specifically used the Energy Management System (EMS) software.
